name: Superame
description:
SUPERAME By kalawasa

[EN] Collect all the golden coca leaves in the shortest possible time and defeat enemies to improve your time. Beat everyone and be number one on the leaderboard.

[ES] Recoge todas las hojas de coca doradas en el menor tiempo posible y derrota a los enemigos para mejorar tu tiempo. Vence a todos y sé el número uno en la clasificación.

CONTROLS

The game is plays with a keyboard. To move around the menu, use the arrow keys or, failing that, the mouse.

For interaction on each map:

  • Move: Left and Right arrow / A and D
  • Jump: Up arrow / W / Space
  • Attack: Q / Alt
  • Confirm: Enter
  • Pause / Quit: Esc
NOTES
  • WIP, new levels and characters will be added over time (according to my mood :D).
CREDITS
  • All design, code, graphics and the music menu by me.
  • SFX: Interfaces Sounds by ObsydianX, all other sounds by Freesound.org
  • Music Map: The first challenge by Komiku, music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
